• Twitter
  • Github
  • LinkedIn
  • RSS

Service Name Checklist

This is the checklist.

Definition
Organization (None) - Define the organization for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"github_organization"=>"organization-name"}
Repository (None) - Establish a Github repository.
1) 2) 3) {"github_repositry"=>"repo-name"}
README (None) - Craft a README for the repository.
1) 2) 3) {"readme_path"=>"/README.md"}
Service Name (None) - Provide title for the service.
1) 2) 3) {"service_name"=>"Service Name"}
Service Description (None) - Provide concise description for the service.
1) 2) 3) {"service_description"=>"This is the description of this service."}
Service Goals (None) - Establish goals that will guide this service.
1) 2) 3) {"service_goals"=>"This is the goals for this service."}
Schema (None) - Organize loose, and JSON schema for the service.
1) 2) 3) {"schema"=>[{"title"=>"The title of the schema"}, {"path"=>"/path/of/the/schema"}]}
OpenAPI (None) - Establish an OpenAPI for the service.
1) 2) 3) {"openapi"=>"/path/to/full/openapi.yaml"}
Assertions (None) - Craft a set of assertions for the service.
1) 2) 3) {"assertions"=>[{"title"=>"The title of the assertion", "path"=>"/path/of/the/assertion"}]}
Team (None) - Define the team behind the service.
1) 2) 3) {"team"=>[{"name"=>"Kin Lane", "role"=>"API Evangelist", "email"=>"info@apievangelist.com", "twitter"=>"kinlane", "github"=>"kinlane"}]}

Design
Versioning (None) - Determine how the code, schema, and the API be versioned.
1) 2) 3) {"versioning"=>{"type"=>"semantic", "format"=>"major.minor.patch", "server"=>"1.0.0", "api"=>"1.0.0", "sdk"=>"1.0.0"}}
Base Path (None) - Set the base path for the service.
Path(s) (None) - Define a set of resource paths for the service.
Verb(s) (None) - Define which HTTP, and other verbs will be used for the service.
Parameters (None) - Define a list of query parameters in use to work with service.
Headers (None) - Define the HTTP Headers that will be used to work with the service.
Response(s) (None) - Provide a resulting message and associated schema definition for the service.
Media Types (None) - Define whether service will return CSV, JSON, and / or XML responses.
Status Codes (None) - Define the available HTTP status code for each responses.
Pagination (None) - Define how pagination will be handled for requests and responses.
Sorting (None) - Define how sorting will be handled for requests and responses.

Database
Platform (None) - Define which platform is in use to manage the database.
1) 2) 3) {"platform"=>"Amazon RDS (Aurora)"}
Schema (None) - Establish the schema used for database based upon definition provided.
1) 2) 3) {"schema"=>"/path/tos/schema.sql"}
Location (None) - Define where the database is located that supports services.
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"instance.id.region.rds.amazonaws.com"}
Access (None) - Quantify how database access is provided behind the service.
1) 2) 3) {"access"=>"ODBC"}
Logs (None) - Define where the database logs are located that support services.
1) 2) 3) {"logs"=>"/rds"}
Backup (None) - Define the database backup process and location for service.
1) 2) 3) {"backup"=>"/rds"}
Encryption (None) - Define the encryption layer for the service database.
1) 2) 3) {"encryption"=>"enabled"}

Storage
Platform (None) - Define which platform is used to store objects.
1) 2) 3) {"platform"=>"Amazon S3"}
Location (None) - Define where objects are stored behind the service.
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"us-east"}
Logs (None) - Define where the storage logs are located that support services.
1) 2) 3) {"logs"=>"/cloudwatch"}
Access (None) - Quantify how objects access is provided behind the service.
1) 2) 3) {"access"=>"API"}
Backup (None) - Define the backup process for objects behind the service.
1) 2) 3) {"backup"=>"Dropbox"}
Encryption (None) - Define the encryption layer for stored objects.
1) 2) 3) {"encryption"=>"enabled"}

DNS
Platform (None) - Define which platform is used to operate DNS.
1) 2) 3) {"platform"=>"CloudFlare"}
Prototype (None) - Provide host for prototype of service.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"prototype.api.example.com"}
Mock (None) - Provide host for mock of service.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"mock.api.example.com"}
Development (None) - Provide host for development version of service.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"dev.api.example.com"}
Production (None) - Provide host for production version of service.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"api.example.com"}
Portal (None) - Provide host for the portal for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"developer.example.com"}
Encryption (None) - Define the encryption layer for service in transport.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>true}

Virtualization
Paths (None) - Providing virtualized paths for the API driving service.
Data (None) - Providing synthesized data behind each API response for service.

Deployment
Platform (None) - Define the platform used to deploy this service.
1) 2) 3) {"platform"=>"AWS API Gateway"}
Framework (None) - Define the code framework used to deploy service.
1) 2) 3) {"framework"=>"none"}
Gateway (None) - Define the gateway used to deploy service.
1) 2) 3) {"framework"=>"none"}
Function (None) - Define the function(s) used to deploy service.
1) 2) 3) {"function"=>"aws_lambda_function_name"}
Containers (None) - Define the container used to deploy service.
1) 2) 3) {"container"=>"none"}
Pipeline (None) - Define the pipeline in place to build and deploys service.
1) 2) 3) {"pipeline"=>"none"}
Location (None) - Define where the service is deployed to.
1) 2) 3) {"region"=>"us-east"}

Orchestration
Build (None) - Define the build process for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"build"=>"manual"}
Hooks (None) - Detail the pre and post commit hooks in use for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"hooks"=>[{"name"=>"Name of Hook", "invoked"=>"git commit", "description"=>"The description of the hook.", "commands"=>"/path/file_name"}]}
Jobs (None) - Define the jobs being executed as part of this service operations.
1) 2) 3) {"jobs"=>[{"name"=>"Name of Job", "description"=>"Description of job.", "openapi"=>"/path/to/openapi/definition/for/job/", "function"=>"lambda_script_used_for_this_job"}]}
Events (None) - Define the events that are in play to help operate this service.
1) 2) 3) {"jobs"=>[{"name"=>"Name of Event", "description"=>"Description of event."}]}
Schedule (None) - Details of the schedules used to orchestrate this service.
1) 2) 3) {"jobs"=>[{"name"=>"Name of Schedule", "description"=>"Description of schedule.", "command"=>"command"}]}

Dependencies
Service (None) - Details of other services this service depends upon.
1) 2) 3) {"name"=>"Name of Service"}
1) 2) 3) {"description"=>"The description of service."}
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"http://example.com/service-information/"}
Software (None) - Details of other software this service depends upon.
1) 2) 3) {"name"=>"Name of Software"}
1) 2) 3) {"description"=>"The description of software."}
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"http://example.com/software-information/"}
People (None) - Details of other people this service depends upon.
1) 2) 3) {"name"=>"Name of Person"}
1) 2) 3) {"description"=>"The description of person / relationship."}
1) 2) 3) {"email"=>"info@example.com"}
1) 2) 3) {"github_user"=>"user"}
Organization (None) - Details of other organizations this service depends upon.
1) 2) 3) {"name"=>"Name of Organization"}
1) 2) 3) {"description"=>"The description of organization / relationship."}
1) 2) 3) {"email"=>"info@example.com"}
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"http://example.com"}

Authentication
Type (None) - Define whether this service uses Basic Auth, API Keys, JWT, or OAuth for authentication.
1) 2) 3) {"type"=>"basic/api-key/jwt/oauth"}
Overview (None) - Provide a location of the page that delivers an overview of this services authentication.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"http://example.com/authentication"}

Management
Platform (None) - Defining the platform used for the API management layer.
1) 2) 3) {"platform"=>"AWS API Gateway"}
Administration (None) - Provide a location for administrating the management layer.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"https://console.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/home?region=us-east-1"}
Signup (None) - Provide a location for users to signup for access to this service.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"https://example.com/signup/"}
Login (None) - Provide a location for users to login to access to this service.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"https://example.com/login/"}
Account (None) - Provide a location for users to access a dashboard for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"https://example.com/account/"}
Applications (None) - Provide the location of applications that are approved to use service.
1) 2) 3) {"url"=>"https://example.com/applications/"}

Logging
Database (None) - Define the logging for the database layer.
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"/rds"}
API (None) - Define the logging for the API access layer.
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"/cloudwatch"}
DNS (None) - Define the logging for the DNS layer.
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"/cloudflare"}
Shipping (None) - Define how longs are shipped or centralized for auditing.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>false}
1) 2) 3) {"location"=>"none"}

Monetization
Acquisition (None) - Provide costs associated with acquisition of resources behind service.
1) 2) 3) {"initial_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"initial_cost"=>"$100.00"}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_cost"=>"$100.00"}
Development (None) - Provide costs associated with the development of this service.
1) 2) 3) {"initial_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"initial_cost"=>"$100.00"}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_cost"=>"$100.00"}
Operation (None) - Provide costs associated with the operation of this service.
1) 2) 3) {"initial_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"initial_cost"=>"$100.00"}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_hours"=>1}
1) 2) 3) {"monthly_cost"=>"$100.00"}
Value (None) - Provide a description of the value delivered by this service.
1) 2) 3) {"description"=>"Delivers X value for consumers by providing them Y."}

Plans
Tiers (None) - Define the tiers of access in place to support this service.
1) 2) 3) {"plans"=>[{"name"=>"Starter", "description"=>"The default API access plan, where every new account begins, allowing the consumer to kick the tires, and see what the API is all about.", "status"=>"None", "entries"=>[{"label"=>"API calls", "description"=>"to the search API", "metric"=>"calls", "limit"=>25, "timeframe"=>"day", "geo"=>"US", "one"=>1, "two"=>nil, "unit"=>"free"}], "elements"=>[{"name"=>"Free"}, {"name"=>"Self Service Support"}]}, {"name"=>"Verified", "description"=>"Once you have added a credit card as part of the account billing, you become a verified API consumer, and have a higher rate limit for usage.", "status"=>"None", "entries"=>[{"label"=>"API calls", "description"=>"to the search API", "metric"=>"calls", "limit"=>"Pay As You Go", "timeframe"=>"day", "geo"=>"US", "one"=>1, "two"=>nil, "unit"=>0.0025}], "elements"=>[{"name"=>"Support"}, {"name"=>"Sales"}, {"name"=>"Security"}, {"name"=>"SLA"}]}]}

Portal
Hosting (None) - Provide details on where this service portal is hosted.
1) 2) 3) {"host"=>"Github Pages"}
Template (None) - Define which graphical UI and brand template is in use for this portal.
1) 2) 3) {"template"=>"html5up"}
Analytics (None) - Define which analytics package is used to measure traffic for portal.
1) 2) 3) {"analytics"=>"Google Analtyics"}

Documentation
Paths (None) - Publish an interactive list of API paths available for service.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>true}
Examples (None) - Provide as many examples of API requests in a variety of languages.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>true}
Definitions (None) - Publish a list of schema definitions in use by this service.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>true}
Errors (None) - Provide a list of available errors users will encounter for this service.
1) 2) 3) {"enabled"=>true}
